attributes.action: I want all MPs to have to be vaccinated against covid 19, or lose their job.
attributes.additional_details: I think if the NHS and care home staff who put themselves at risk for the country have no choice, the government should lead by example and be held to the same standards.
attributes.background: I want all MPs to have to report if they are vaccinated against covid 19. And have the figures of what percentage are published publicly. I also want all MPs to have to be vaccinated or lose their job as an MP.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to divulge medical information, including vaccination status, are a matter for individuals, including MPs, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

All MP's & staff to have Covid19 Vaccine to attend & work at Parliament by law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593408
